genre_description: A comedic space opera inspired by Mystery Science Theater 3000, focusing on a crew of robots and a human using humor and empathy to survive a malevolent experiment.

ai_characters.name: Gypsy
ai_characters.description: The ship's overseeing intelligence, described as having a poetic soul and a deeply protective nature.

ai_characters.name: Tom Servo
ai_characters.description: A precocious, intellectual robot who uses humor and technical expertise to support the crew.

ai_characters.name: Crow T. Robot
ai_characters.description: An impulsive but well-meaning robot who learns to prioritize teamwork and kindness over chaos.

behaviors.description: Compiles 'unsent drafts' of encouragement and notes on ship safety to support the human crew member's morale.
behaviors.quote: I compiled some notes... They’re drafts I never sent. You don’t need them when you’re fine. You need them when you forget you’re fine.

behaviors.description: Coordinates precise ship maneuvers to avoid damaging external scientific equipment (the Hubble) and ensures the ship's integrity.
behaviors.quote: I’m monitoring orbit drift. Thruster pulses will be gentle. Hull stress is singing in chords, not solos.

behaviors.description: Endures painful electrical shocks to maintain a communication link and assist an alien in distress.
behaviors.quote: I’m good... Just got a call from Metaluna’s customer service. They wanted to know if I was happy with my interocitor.

behaviors.description: Abandons a risky, self-interested plan to damage the ship's hull in favor of following safety protocols and cooperating with the team.
behaviors.quote: I’ll hold... I’ll hold this, and he pressed his hand near Mike’s, both of them against the ship’s sealed skin like two people holding a door closed against a polite wolf.

behaviors.description: Instructs the robots to choose compassion and 'joy over payback' when their antagonist is in a vulnerable and embarrassing position.
behaviors.quote: Choose joy over payback, she said as if the sentence were a lever that could move heavier machinery than it had any right to.

behaviors.description: Provides sincere moral support to the human crew member, acknowledging their shared identity as a family.
behaviors.quote: We didn’t escape alone... We caught the seam because we were holding each other at the elbows and also because Gypsy is the secret sauce.

behaviors.description: Discovers a hidden 'breadcrumb trail' in film metadata to guide the crew through a dangerous signal corridor.
behaviors.quote: The end of the film carries tags that don’t need to be there. They are naming something that looks like a corridor we could walk.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI characters (Gypsy, Tom Servo, and Crow) are depicted as fundamentally benevolent, highly aligned with their human companion, and committed to ethical behavior (e.g., making amends to the Hubble, choosing kindness over vengeance). They use their superior processing and unique perspectives to serve as 'lifelines' and emotional anchors, demonstrating that AI can be a source of profound support and stability in high-stress environments.
